name: King Ball Domination
description:
King Ball Domination

King Ball Domination is a 2D online 1v1 strategy game where players must fill their bars to dominate the game and be the next King Ball. Players will be able to bounce the balls up and hopefully it will get into their own container.

Be the first to fill up and you will be next King of the game!

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

Features :

- Join or Create Your Own Server!

- 1v1 Online Multiplayer 

- Unique 2D Bounce Physics

- Satisfying Balls Experience

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

This game is meant to be played on Android devices. This game is made for Fast Game Development Challenge in 16 hours. The assets in this game are built with zero funding and captured from unity default sprites. 

King Ball Domination by LAKESPRODUCTION ©2019
